data.title: Latest news, views, pictures, video
data.meta_description: Northern Irish actor and director, Kenneth was married to Emma Thompson for six years in the early nineties. He then famously dated Helena Bonham Carter before marrying director Lindsay Brunnock in 2003. In 2012 he was nominated for an Oscar for Best Supporting Actor for My Week with Marilyn.
data.text:
One of the greatest British films of all time is now streaming on Disney Plus - don't be slow to watch it!

How to watch Oppenheimer and is the Cillian Murphy movie streaming ahead of the Oscars?

Emma Thompson says 'romantic love is a myth and quite dangerous' - What do YOU think?

Northern Irish actor and director, Kenneth was married to Emma Thompson for six years in the early nineties. He then famously dated Helena Bonham Carter before marrying director Lindsay Brunnock in 2003. In 2012 he was nominated for an Oscar for Best Supporting Actor for My Week with Marilyn.
